065/**
066 * Implement a subset of Bitcoin JSON RPC using a WalletAppKit
067 */
068@Named
069public class WalletAppKitService implements BitcoinJsonRpc, Closeable {
070    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(WalletAppKitService.class);
071    // P2P user-agent string
072    private static final String userAgentName = "WalletAppKitService";
073    // P2P user-agent version
074    private static final String appVersion = "0.1";
075    // server version, placeholder for now (returned in `getnetworkinfo`)
076    private static final int version = 1;
077    private static final String helpString = """
078== Blockchain ==
079getbestblockhash
080getblock hash verbosity(0,1,2)
081getblockchaininfo
082getblockcount
083getblockhash height [TBD]
084getblockheader hash verbose(boolean)
085
086== Control ==
087help
088stop
089
090== Network ==
091getconnectioncount
092getnetworkinfo
093
094== Rawtransactions ==
095createrawtransaction [{"txid":"hex","vout":n},...] [{"address":amount},...]
096sendrawtransaction hex
097
098== Wallet ==
099getbalance
100getnewaddress
101listunspent minConf maxConf addresses include-unsafe
102sendtoaddress address amount
103signrawtransactionwithwallet hex
104""";
105
106    protected final HexFormat hexFormat = HexFormat.of();
107
108    protected final BitcoinNetwork network;
109    protected final WalletAppKit kit;
110    protected final ObjectMapper mapper;
111
112    /* Dummy fields for JSON RPC responses TODO: Implement them */
113    private int timeOffset = 0;
114    private BigDecimal difficulty = new BigDecimal(0);
115    private BigDecimal verificationProgress = new BigDecimal(0);
116    private byte[] chainWork = new byte[]{0x00, 0x00};
117
118    private static final AddressParser parser = AddressParser.getDefault();
119    private WalletSigningService signingService;
120
121    /**
122     * Create an instance in a temporary directory. Useful for testing.
123     * @param network network to operate on
124     * @param scriptType script type for wallet
125     * @param walletBaseName base name for the two wallet files
126     * @return an un-started instance (use {@link #start()} to start it)
127     */
128    public static WalletAppKitService createTemporary(BitcoinNetwork network, ScriptType scriptType, String walletBaseName) {
129        WalletAppKit walletAppKit = createTemporaryWallet(network, scriptType, walletBaseName);
130        return new WalletAppKitService(walletAppKit);
131    }
132
133    public static WalletAppKit createTemporaryWallet(BitcoinNetwork network, ScriptType scriptType, String walletBaseName) {
134        Context.propagate(new Context());
135        String filePrefix = walletBaseName + "-" + network;
136        File dataDirectory = null;
137        try {
138            dataDirectory = Files.createTempDirectory(walletBaseName).toFile();
139        } catch (IOException e) {
140            throw new RuntimeException(e);
141        }
142        log.info("Returning WalletAppKit bean, wallet directory: {}, prefix: {}", dataDirectory.getAbsolutePath(), filePrefix);
143        return new WalletAppKit(network, scriptType, KeyChainGroupStructure.BIP43, dataDirectory, filePrefix);
144    }
145
146    /**
147     * Construct from an (un-started) {@link WalletAppKit} instance.
148     * @param walletAppKit instance
149     */
150    @Inject
151    public WalletAppKitService(WalletAppKit walletAppKit) {
152        kit = walletAppKit;
153        network = kit.network();
154        mapper = new ObjectMapper();
155        mapper.registerModule(new RpcServerModule());
156    }
157
158    @PostConstruct
159    public void start() {
160        log.info("WalletAppKitService.start()");
161        kit.setUserAgent(userAgentName, appVersion);
162        kit.setBlockingStartup(false);  // `false` means startup is complete when network activity begins
163        kit.startAsync();
164        kit.awaitRunning();
165        signingService = new WalletSigningService(kit.wallet());
166    }
167
168    public Network network() {
169        return this.network;
170    }
171
172    public PeerGroup getPeerGroup() {
173        kit.awaitRunning();
174        return kit.peerGroup();
175    }
176
177    @Override
178    public CompletableFuture<String> help() {
179        return result(helpString);
180    }
181
182    @Override
183    public CompletableFuture<String> stop() {
184        log.info("stop command received, ignoring...");
185        return result("stop command ignored.");
186    }
187
188    @Override
189    public CompletableFuture<Integer> getblockcount() {
190        log.info("getblockcount");
191        if(!kit.isRunning()) {
192            String state = kit.state().toString();
193            log.warn("WalletAppKit not running, state: {}", state);
194            return exception(new RuntimeException("WalletAppKit not running, state: " + state));
195        }
196        return result(kit.chain().getChainHead().getHeight());
197    }
198
199    @Override
200    public CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash> getbestblockhash() {
201        log.info("getbestblockhash");
202        if(!kit.isRunning()) {
203            log.warn("kit not running, returning null");
204            return null;
205        }
206        return result(kit.chain().getChainHead().getHeader().getHash());
207    }
208
209    @Override
210    public CompletableFuture<JsonNode> getblockheader(String blockHashString, Boolean verbose) {
211        return getblockheader2(Sha256Hash.wrap(blockHashString), verbose);
212    }
213
214    public CompletableFuture<JsonNode> getblockheader2(Sha256Hash blockHash, Boolean verbose) {
215        if (verbose == null || verbose) {
216            return getBlockInfo(blockHash, BlockInfo.IncludeTxFlag.NO)
217                    .thenApply(mapper::valueToTree);
218        } else {
219            return getBlockBytes(blockHash)
220                    .thenApply(HexUtil::bytesToHexString)
221                    .thenApply(mapper::valueToTree);
222        }
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Partial implementation of `getblock`
227     *
228     * In the case where verbosity = 0, a block is returned without transactions (which is incorrect)
229     * For verbosity = 1, we return a BlockInfo, but some fields may be missing or incorrect, including a list of TXIDs
230     * For verbosity = 2, we are currently throwing an exception.
231     * 
232     * @param blockHashString The hash of the block we are to return (as hex)
233     * @param verbosity Specifies the format to return (currently only `1` halfway works)
234     * @return Either a `Block` or `BlockInfo` depending upon verbosity.
235     */
236    @Override
237    public CompletableFuture<JsonNode> getblock(String blockHashString, Integer verbosity) {
238        return getblock2(Sha256Hash.wrap(blockHashString), verbosity);
239    }
240
241    public CompletableFuture<JsonNode> getblock2(Sha256Hash blockHash, Integer verbosity) {
242        int verbosityInt = verbosity != null ? verbosity : 1;
243        return (switch (verbosityInt) {
244            case 0 -> getBlockBytes(blockHash).thenApply(HexUtil::bytesToHexString);
245            case 1 -> getBlockInfo(blockHash, BlockInfo.IncludeTxFlag.IDONLY);
246            case 2 -> getBlockInfo(blockHash, BlockInfo.IncludeTxFlag.YES);
247            default -> exception(new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown verbosity parameter"));
248        }).thenApply(mapper::valueToTree);
249    }
250
251    /**
252     * Placeholder -- currently throws `UnsupportedOperationException`
253     * 
254     * @param blockNumber The block height of the desired block
255     * @return The Sha256Hash of the specified block
256     */
257    @Override
258    public CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash> getblockhash(Integer blockNumber) {
259        // TODO: Extend Blockchain/Blockstore so it can do this
260        return exception(new UnsupportedOperationException("Unimplemented RPC method"));
261    }
262
263    @Override
264    public CompletableFuture<Integer> getconnectioncount() {
265        if(!kit.isRunning()) {
266            return exception(new RuntimeException("Kit not running"));
267        }
268        try {
269            return result(kit.peerGroup().numConnectedPeers());
270        } catch (IllegalStateException ex) {
271            return exception(ex);
272        }
273    }
274
275    @Override
276    public CompletableFuture<BlockChainInfo> getblockchaininfo() {
277        return result(new BlockChainInfo(BlockChainInfo.networkToChainName(network),   // Chain ID
278                kit.chain().getChainHead().getHeight(),             // Block processed (same as headers for SPV)
279                kit.chain().getChainHead().getHeight(),             // Headers validated
280                kit.chain().getChainHead().getHeader().getHash(),   // Best block hash
281                difficulty,
282                verificationProgress,
283                chainWork));
284    }
285
286    @Override
287    public CompletableFuture<NetworkInfo> getnetworkinfo() {
288        byte[] localServices = {};
289        Object[] network = {};
290        Object[] address = {};
291        return result(new NetworkInfo(version,
292                "",
293                ProtocolVersion.CURRENT.intValue(),
294                timeOffset,
295                getconnectioncount().join(),
296                "proxy",
297                (int) Transaction.REFERENCE_DEFAULT_MIN_TX_FEE.getValue(),  // relayFee
298                localServices,
299                network,
300                address));
301    }
302
303    record outpoint(Sha256Hash txId, int vout) {
304        public outpoint(String idString, int vout) {
305            this(Sha256Hash.wrap(idString), vout);
306        }
307        public outpoint(Map<String, Object> json) {
308            this((String) json.get("txid"), ((Number) json.get("vout")).intValue());
309        }
310
311    }
312    record output(Address address, Coin amount) {
313        public output(String addString, String amountString) {
314            this(parser.parseAddress(addString),  Coin.parseCoin(amountString));
315        }
316        Script script() {
317            return ScriptBuilder.createP2PKHOutputScript(this.address().getHash());
318        }
319    }
320
321    @Override
322    public CompletableFuture<String> createrawtransaction(List<Map<String, Object>> inputs, List<Map<String, String>> outputs) {
323        try {
324            List<TransactionInputData> ins = inputs.stream()
325                    .map(outpoint::new)
326                    .flatMap(op -> signingService.findUnspentOutput(op.txId, op.vout).stream())
327                    .map(TransactionInputData::fromTxOut)
328                    .toList();
329            List<? extends TransactionOutputData> outs = outputs.stream()
330                    .flatMap(map -> map.entrySet().stream())
331                    .map(entry -> new output(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()))
332                    .map(o -> new TransactionOutputDataScript(o.amount(), o.script()))
333                    .toList();
334            // TODO: Add a change output?
335            SigningRequest sr = SigningRequest.of(ins, (List<TransactionOutputData>) outs);
336            Transaction rawTx = sr.toUnsignedTransaction();
337            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(HexFormat.of().formatHex(rawTx.serialize()));
338        } catch (Throwable t) {
339            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(t);
340        }
341    }
342
343    @Override
344    public CompletableFuture<Address> getnewaddress() {
345        DeterministicKey key = kit.wallet().getActiveKeyChain().getKey(KeyChain.KeyPurpose.RECEIVE_FUNDS);
346        Address address = key.toAddress(ScriptType.P2PKH, network);
347        log.warn("address {} key path: {}", address, key.getPathAsString());
348        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(address);
349    }
350
351    @Override
352    public CompletableFuture<Coin> getbalance() {
353        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(kit.wallet().getBalance());
354    }
355
356    @Override
357    public CompletableFuture<List<UnspentOutput>> listunspent(Integer minConf, Integer maxConf, List<String> addresses, Boolean includeUnsafe) {
358        List<Address> addressList = addresses != null
359                ? addresses.stream().map(parser::parseAddress).toList()
360                : List.of();
361        List<TransactionOutput> outs = signingService.findUnspentOutputs(
362                                            minConf != null ? minConf : DEFAULT_MIN_CONF,
363                                            maxConf != null ? maxConf : DEFAULT_MAX_CONF,
364                                            addressList);
365        List<UnspentOutput> unspents = outs.stream()
366                .map(out -> new UnspentOutput(
367                        out.getParentTransactionHash(),
368                        out.getIndex(),
369                        null, // Address (get from script?)
370                        "", // label
371                        hexFormat.formatHex(out.getScriptPubKey().program()), // scriptPubKey
372                        out.getValue(),     // amount
373                        out.getParentTransactionDepthInBlocks(),  // confirmations
374                        null,   // redeemScript
375                        null,   // witnessScript
376                        true,   // spendable
377                        true,   // solvable
378                        "description",  // description
379                        true)   // safe
380                )
381                .toList();
382        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(unspents);
383    }
384
385    /**
386     * Send coins to an address
387     * @param toAddressString Address to send coins to
388     * @param amountDouble Amount to send
389     * @return future that completes with a transaction hash/id when the tx is successfully relayed
390     */
391    @Override
392    public CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash> sendtoaddress(String toAddressString, Double amountDouble) {
393        log.info("sendtoaddress {}, {}", toAddressString, amountDouble);
394        Address toAddress = parser.parseAddress(toAddressString);
395        Coin amount = Coin.ofBtc(BigDecimal.valueOf(amountDouble));
396        Transaction signedTx;
397        try {
398            signedTx = signingService.signSendToAddress(toAddress, amount).join();
399        } catch (IOException | InsufficientMoneyException e) {
400            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(e);
401        }
402        return sendTransaction(signedTx)
403                .thenCompose(tb1 -> tb1.awaitRelayed()
404                        .thenApply(tb2 -> tb2.transaction()
405                                .getTxId()
406                        )
407                );
408    }
409
410    @Override
411    public CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash> sendrawtransaction(String hex) {
412        log.info("received raw tx: {}", hex);
413        ByteBuffer raw = ByteBuffer.wrap(hexFormat.parseHex(hex));
414        Transaction signedTx;
415        try {
416            signedTx = Transaction.read(raw);
417        } catch (ProtocolException pe) {
418            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(new RuntimeException("Invalid raw (hex) transaction", pe));
419        }
420        log.info("received raw tx: {}", signedTx);
421        try {
422            Transaction.verify(network, signedTx);
423        } catch (VerificationException ve) {
424            // TODO: More validation?
425            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(ve);
426        }
427        return sendTransaction(signedTx)
428                .whenComplete((bcast, error) -> {
429                    if (error != null) {
430                        log.info("Broadcast {}, done: {}", bcast.transaction().getTxId(), bcast.awaitSent().isDone());
431                    } else {
432                        log.error("", error);
433                    }
434                })
435                .thenCompose(tb1 -> tb1.awaitRelayed()
436                        .thenApply(tb2 -> tb2.transaction()
437                                .getTxId()
438                        )
439                );
440    }
441
442    /**
443     * @param hex hex-encoded unsigned raw transaction
444     * @return signed raw transaction
445     */
446    @Override
447    public CompletableFuture<SignedRawTransaction> signrawtransactionwithwallet(String hex) {
448        ByteBuffer raw = ByteBuffer.wrap(hexFormat.parseHex(hex));
449
450        RawTransactionSigningRequest signingRequest;
451        try {
452            Transaction unsignedTx = Transaction.read(raw);
453            log.info("received tx: {}", unsignedTx);
454            signingRequest = RawTransactionSigningRequest.ofTransaction(unsignedTx);
455        } catch (BufferUnderflowException | ProtocolException e) {
456            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(new RuntimeException("Invalid raw (hex) transaction", e));
457        }
458
459        return signingService.signTransaction(signingRequest)
460                .thenApply(SignedRawTransaction::of);
461    }
462
463    private CompletableFuture<TransactionBroadcast> sendTransaction(Transaction tx) {
464        try {
465            log.info("committing tx to wallet: {}", tx);
466            kit.wallet().commitTx(tx);
467            log.info("broadcasting tx: {}", tx);
468            return kit.peerGroup().broadcastTransaction(tx).awaitSent();
469        } catch (Throwable t) {
470            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(t);
471        }
472    }
473
474    private CompletableFuture<byte[]> getBlockBytes(Sha256Hash blockHash) {
475        // TODO: This block should have transactions
476        StoredBlock storedBlock;
477        try {
478            storedBlock = getStoredBlockByHash(kit.chain(), blockHash);
479        } catch (BlockStoreException e) {
480            return exception(e);
481        }
482        byte[] data = storedBlock.getHeader().serialize();
483        return result(data);
484    }
485
486    public CompletableFuture<BlockInfo> getBlockInfo(Sha256Hash blockHash, BlockInfo.IncludeTxFlag includeTx) {
487        BlockInfo blockInfo;
488        try {
489            blockInfo = getBlockInfoByHash(kit.chain(), blockHash, includeTx);
490            log.info("blockinfo: {}, {}", blockInfo.hash, blockInfo.height);
491        } catch (BlockStoreException e) {
492            return exception(e);
493        }
494        return result(blockInfo);
495    }
496
497    protected <T> CompletableFuture<T> result(T result) {
498        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(result);
499    }
500
501    private <T> CompletableFuture<T> exception(Throwable exception) {
502        return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(exception);
503    }
504
505    private static StoredBlock getStoredBlockByHash(AbstractBlockChain blockChain, Sha256Hash blockHash) throws BlockStoreException {
506        return blockChain.getBlockStore().get(blockHash);
507    }
508
509    /**
510     * Get a BlockInfo for the specified hash
511     *
512     * @param blockChain The blockchain object to pull the data from
513     * @param blockHash The hash of the desired block
514     * @param includeTx whether to include transactions (currently must be false)
515     * @return block information (currently incomplete and untested)
516     * @throws BlockStoreException Something went wrong
517     */
518    private static BlockInfo getBlockInfoByHash(AbstractBlockChain blockChain, Sha256Hash blockHash, BlockInfo.IncludeTxFlag includeTx) throws BlockStoreException {
519        if (includeTx == BlockInfo.IncludeTxFlag.YES) {
520            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Including transactions not supported yet");
521        }
522        StoredBlock block = getStoredBlockByHash(blockChain, blockHash);
523        Block header = block.getHeader();
524        int blockHeight = block.getHeight();
525        int confirmations = blockChain.getBestChainHeight() - blockHeight;
526        log.trace("building BlockInfo for hash: {} height: {}", blockHash, blockHeight);
527        return new BlockInfo(header.getHash(),
528                confirmations,
529                header.messageSize(),
530                blockHeight,
531                (int) header.getVersion(),
532                header.getMerkleRoot(),
533                -1,     // Unknown number of Transactions
534                (includeTx == BlockInfo.IncludeTxFlag.IDONLY) ? hashListFromTxList(header.getTransactions()) : null,
535                (int) header.time().getEpochSecond(),
536                header.getNonce(),
537                null, // TODO: Return "bits" here
538                new BigDecimal(header.getDifficultyTargetAsInteger()),  // TODO: Verify this is correct
539                block.getChainWork().toString(),
540                block.getPrev(blockChain.getBlockStore()).getHeader().getHash(),
541                null);  // TODO: Extend BlockStore to make this information retrievable
542    }
543
544    private static BlockInfo.Sha256HashList hashListFromTxList(List<Transaction> txList) {
545        if (txList == null) {
546            return null;
547        } else {
548            List<Sha256Hash> list = txList.stream()
549                    .map(Transaction::getTxId)
550                    .collect(Collectors.toList());
551            return new BlockInfo.Sha256HashList(list);
552        }
553    }
554
555    @Override
556    @PreDestroy
557    public void close() {
558        log.info("Closing WalletAppKit...");
559        kit.close();
560        kit.awaitTerminated();  // This should be done by WalletAppKit itself, see https://github.com/bitcoinj/bitcoinj/pull/3028
561        log.info("WalletAppKit terminated");
562    }
563}
